tweet.3: En solo 10 meses hay elecciones al Congreso y en menos de un año presidenciales. No es más democrático que sean todos los ciudadanos con su voto, que un “Comité de Paro” de discutible representatividad, los que deciden las reformas a implementar?

tweet.9: Hay que reformar el sistema político para facilitar que candidatos independientes puedan ser elegidos a JALs, concejos, asambleas, Congreso, gobernaciones, alcaldías y Presidencia.Bien q partidos tengan ventajas como acceso a recursos o TV, sin cerrar el sistema a independientes
tweet.10: En el sistema cerrado y excluyente de partidos de Colombia, ni siquiera es posible que congresistas, o concejales, que se sienten mal en sus partidos, puedan cambiar de partido sin retirarse con un año de antelación a la inscripción de la@candidatura
tweet.11: ¿Qué pasaría si un estudiante quiere lanzarse al Congreso en marzo? No podría con el sistema cerrado de partidos construido por politiqueros profesionales y politólogos útiles. Sin un partido le es imposible pasar el umbral; ni siquiera para ser edil.
tweet.12: En 1970 se vendieron menos de 5000 motos en Colombia. Era un lujo inimaginable por ej para un campesino. En el 2000 se vendieron 56.419; y en el 2019 se llegó a 612.775! Podemos crecer mucho más y generar más y mejores empleos, pero solo con más inversión privada, más empresas!
tweet.13: Bravooo Colombia! Ese partido va súpeeeer!
tweet.14: Cada inversión nueva, cada empresa nueva o ampliación de una existente, necesita quien opere máquinas, computadores, vehículos; venda, atienda gente; haga comida a los trabajadores. GENERA EMPLEO. Y la demanda de trabajadores SUBE los salarios. Así avanzamos. No hay otra manera
tweet.15: Gracias a los representantes a la Cámara que votaron contra la moción de censura al Ministro Diego Molano, por sus cualidades, y porque saben que este no es el momento para juegos políticos que debiliten las instituciones de nuestra democracia, sino todo lo contrario
tweet.16: Las medidas de gratuidad en la educación superior pública, el apoyo financiero para quienes empleen jóvenes, las facilidades para que los jóvenes puedan adquirir vivienda, son medidas concretas importantes que ha expedido el Gobierno para apoyar a nuestros jóvenes
tweet.17: A Duque le tocó: jóvenes con un año y medio sin clases presenciales, ni deporte, ni rumba, ni empleo por el COVID; 1,8 millones de inmigrantes pobres;un gobierno en Venezuela de enemigo activo, apoyando a narco-guerrillas y vándalos; la mayor producción de coca jamás. Muy difícil

text_translated.1: It would seem that growth in COVID cases is related to Unemployment. Hence the increase in deaths by COVID also https://t.co/illyiltHnt
text_translated.2: The gentlemen of the Paro Committee should first ask for a law that will end the electoral thresholds invented by political parties in order to exclude new people, independent of them. This opens the way to Congress for representatives of young people and those who protest
text_translated.3: In just 10 months there are elections to Congress and in less than a presidential year. Is it not more democratic that it is all citizens with their vote, than a “Strike Committee” of debatable representativeness, who decide the reforms to implement?
text_translated.4: Percentage of total taxes paid by companies https://t.co/GiPTw3C7Qv
text_translated.5: According to FEDESARROLLO, unemployment losses in May were between $4.8 and $6.1 billion. That brings less investment, more unemployment, more poverty, higher prices. text_translated.6: Tax rates on profits paid by companies in OECD countries. Generally low taxes are charged to businesses to stimulate investment and employment and are charged rather to natural persons https://t.co/j5ARfOzOBg

text_translated.9: The political system needs to be reformed to make it easier for independent candidates to be elected to JALs, councils, assemblies, Congress, governorates, mayors and presidency.Whether parties have advantages such as access to resources or TV, without closing the system to independent
text_translated.10: In Colombia's closed and exclusive party system, it is not even possible that congressmen, or councilors, who feel bad in their matches, can change matches without retiring one year before the registration of the @candidatura
text_translated.11: What if a student wants to go to Congress in March? I could not with the closed system of matches built by professional politicians and useful political scientists. Without a match it is impossible for him to pass the threshold; not even to be mayor.
text_translated.12: In 1970 fewer than 5000 motorcycles were sold in Colombia. It was an unimaginable luxury for a peasant. In 2000 56,419 were sold; and in 2019 it reached 612,775! We can grow much more and generate more and better jobs, but only with more private investment, more companies!
text_translated.13: Bravooo Colombia! That game is going to supeeeer!
text_translated.14: Every new investment, every new company or expansion of an existing one, needs who operates machines, computers, vehicles; sells, cares for people; makes food to workers. GENERATES EMPLOYMENT. And the demand for workers RAISES wages. That's how we move forward. There is no other way
text_translated.15: Thank you to the House representatives who voted against Minister Diego Molano's motion of censure, for his qualities, and because they know that this is not the time for political games that weaken the institutions of our democracy, but quite the opposite
text_translated.16: Free public higher education measures, financial support for youth employing, facilities for young people to acquire housing are important concrete measures issued by the Government to support our youth
text_translated.17: It was up to Duque: young people with a year and a half without face-to-face classes, no sport, no rumba, no COVID employment; 1.8 million poor immigrants; an active enemy government in Venezuela, supporting narco-guerrillas and vandals; the largest production of coca ever.
